name: 蔡福裕
objective:
本門授課之目的在介紹各種有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
The course introduces various kinds of organic synthetic methods, principles and applications.  The most commonly used organic reactions and their mechanisms are also discussed.
schedule:
1-3 週: Conjugated Pi Systems and Pericyclic Reactions
4-5 週: Aromatic Compounds
6-8 週: Aromatic Substitution Reactions
9 週：期中考
10-11 週: Aldehydes and Ketones
12-14 週: Carboxylic Acids and Their Derivatives
15-17 週: Alpha Carbon Chemistry: Enols and Enolates
18 週：期末考
scorePolicy:
出缺席: 20%
期中考: 40%
期末考: 40%
materials:
Organic Chemistry
Fourth Edition
David Klein
consultation: 可至分子館 402 室或 4 樓教師辦公室諮詢
